#Installing packages 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(carat)
library(mlbench)
```


#Linear Regression
##Checking head 
Predicting MPG from this dataset 
```{r}
head(mtcars)
```

##Building Linear Regression model 
mpg = f(hp,wt,am) = b0+b1 + b2 * wt + b3 * am 

```{r}
model_lm <- lm(mpg~hp + wt + am, data = mtcars)
model_lm
```

##Train/Test split 
```{r}
model_lm_caret <- train(mpg~ hp + wt + am,
                        data = mtcars,
                        method = "lm")
```
